from notebookutils import mssparkutils

timeout_in_seconds = 60 * 30

# Builds LPA FACT
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_local_planning_authority_fact',timeout_in_seconds) 
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_local_planning_authority_dim',timeout_in_seconds)

# Builds DIMs dependant on LPA fact
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_lpa_resposibility_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_picaso_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_high_hedges_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_local_plans_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_hedgerow_dim',timeout_in_seconds)

# Builds Event
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_event_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_event_fact',timeout_in_seconds)

# Builds DIMs for the Case_fact
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/Legacy/casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim_legacy',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_nsip_redactions_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_case_officer_additional_details_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_common_land_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_contact_information_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_contacts_organisation_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_decision_issue_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_local_plans_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_nsip_advice_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_nsip_examination_timetable_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_nsip_relevant_representation_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_inspector_cases_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_case_info_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_case_dates_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_advert_details_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_enforcement_grounds_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_application_sub_type_case_name_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_special_circumstance_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_additional_fields_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialism_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_case_dates_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_case_string_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_coastal_access_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_environment_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_high_court_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_modifications_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_purchase_notice_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_specialist_recharge_dim',timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_tpo_dim',timeout_in_seconds)

# Builds case_fact
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_case_full_list',timeout_in_seconds)
